CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1959, pg. 12, reads: "Love's Labor's Lost...Sometimes - Home Is Where Heart Remains - 'Goldies' House - Negroes are not alone in letting their property run down some time. The above house at Centre Ave. and Wandless St. is owned by a white woman, known as 'Goldie. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Three story brick house with turret on right, mansard roof, tire in yard, and completely broken windows, on Centre Avenue at intersection of Wandless Street, Hill District
CatSubject_tab: Houses--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Streets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Centre Avenue (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Wandless Street (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Hill District (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
